alert.note: Alert for Coastal Pender; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pender County through 900 PM EDT... At 824 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over White Stocking, or near Burgaw, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Surf City, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, White Stocking, Topsail, Maple Hill, Ashton, Woodside, Edgecomb, St. Helena and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 399 and 406. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
